column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was our first Chicago pizza experience
column2: I thought the dough would be a little more deep dish if you will meaning I thought it would be a little thicker.  Based on the waitresses recommendation we got a half cheese half special
column3: which it had a sausage base. My husband thought that the sausage was an overkill and pretty much thought he was eating just a layer of sausage on his pizza.   My half with just cheese was pretty decent
column4: I was happy with it and the flavor that came with and the buttery crust.
